bcid
Class dataGroupMinter

java.lang.Object
  bcid.GenericIdentifier
      bcid.dataGroupEncoder
          bcid.dataGroupMinter
All Implemented Interfaces:
encoder, GenericIdentifierInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
elementMinter
public class dataGroupMinter
extends dataGroupEncoder

This class mints shoulders for use in the EZID systems known as data groups. Minting data groups are important in establishing the ownership of particular data elements.
